name: Ch11BBaseConvo2
_source: speak;Cormag;So, Vanessa.|I've been meaning to ask you about your pegasus.
speak;Vanessa;Oh?|What would you like to know?
speak;Cormag;How long have you been riding her?|The bond between a knight and their mount is important.
speak;Vanessa;Since I was a trainee in Frelia.|About five years now.|And yourself with your wyvern?
speak;Cormag;Seven years with Genarog.|He was a difficult one to tame at first.|Wyverns are naturally more aggressive than pegasi.
speak;Vanessa;I've heard that.|They're quite different creatures, aren't they?|Pegasi refuse to accept riders with malice in their hearts.
speak;Vanessa;That's why only women can ride them.|They sense purity of intention.
speak;Cormag;Interesting.|Wyverns are almost the opposite.|They respect strength and assertiveness.
speak;Cormag;A hesitant rider would be thrown off immediately.|Or worse.
speak;Vanessa;What about their care?|Pegasi require regular grooming and specific herbs in their feed.
speak;Vanessa;Their wings are particularly delicate.|We brush them daily with special combs.
speak;Cormag;Wyverns are hardier.|Their scales need occasional polishing to prevent infection,|but they can go days without proper care if necessary.
speak;Cormag;Though Genarog gets irritable if I skip our morning flight.|He's particular about his routine.
speak;Vanessa;That sounds familiar!|Titania won't let me mount her if I haven't brought her favorite treats.|They're intelligent creatures, aren't they?
speak;Cormag;More than most people realize.|Wyverns can remember faces for years.|And they never forget a slight.
speak;Vanessa;Pegasi are similar.|They remember kindness especially.|It's fascinating how different yet similar our mounts are.
speak;Cormag;Indeed.|Say, I have something for you actually.|In Grado, we make protective charms from shed wyvern scales.
speak;Cormag;Here.|It's meant to ward off arrows - a rider's greatest threat.|The scales are surprisingly lightweight but strong.
speak;Vanessa;It's beautiful!|Thank you, Cormag.|The craftsmanship is exquisite.
speak;Vanessa;I have something for you as well.|Though it's not as practical, perhaps.
speak;Vanessa;In Frelia, we preserve pegasus feathers from their molting.|This one is from Titania's wing.|It's said to bring good fortune on long journeys.
speak;Cormag;I'm honored.|Pegasus feathers are rare in Grado.|Thank you, Vanessa.
speak;Cormag;Perhaps our mounts aren't the only ones forming bonds across borders.
speak;Vanessa;I think you're right.|Maybe we could arrange a flight together sometime?|I'd love to learn more about wyvern riding techniques.
speak;Cormag;I'd like that.|And I could learn a thing or two about pegasus handling.
speak;Vanessa;It's settled then.|Until our next patrol?
speak;Cormag;Until then.|May your skies be clear, Vanessa.
